hadith.chapterTitle: Excellence of Standing in Prayer at Night
hadith.body:
'Aishah (May Allah be pleased with her) reported: The Prophet (ﷺ) would sleep during the early part of night and stand in Salat during the latter part.

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].
- وعنها أن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم، كان ينام أول الليل، ويقوم آخره فيصلي‏.‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏ ‏.‏
